items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+53 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
explicitMods: Fires 3 secondary Projectiles

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.

symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.
